body.para: One of the things I run into at times is when someone mails me and says "am I still on the list? Is something wrong?"
And what I generally do is do a find_members and send them the result. Much of the time, it's a list that's gone quiet, sometimes it's a problem on their end.

but I was thinking today, as I did this, that it'd be nice if find_members had a verbose flag that would optionally print out a summary of the user settings, so I could tell at a glance (and forward to the user) things like digest mode or nomail settings, since a person could be nomail and you can't really tell without using the web interface....
